attributes.action: Intervene to re-instate the summer picnic concerts at Kenwood House north London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The summer picnic concerts at kenwood house in north London have been an annual event for 55 years. This year due to noise complaints from local residents the concerts have been cancelled. Thousands of people from all over the country enjoy these fantastic outdoor concerts every year and I for one think it is deplorable that a small group of people can put an end to this enjoyment for the rest of us.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
